text: Iwo adzalira kwa iwo. “Kodi inu sitinali kukhalira limodzi?” Okhulupilira adzayankha kuti: “Zoonadi koma inu mudadzisocheretsa nokha. Inu mudanyengedwa, mudakayikira ndipo zilakolako zanu zidakunyengani inu mpaka pamene chilango cha Mulungu chinachitika. Ndipo wonyenga adakunyengani inu pa nkhani zokhudza Mulungu.”
